_header: For the reward of half a year
Bibliographic Ghosts:
Grenoble: ghost in spite of Brown and Robbins (1943)

XChampollion-Figeac, Aime. Les Poesies du duc Charles d’Orleans. Paris, 1842, 266; MacCracken (1911)

_description: Charles d’Orléans, a roundel — fourteen lines

BNfr25458.First Lines:
[F]for the reward of half a ȝereTow trewelouys upon the
                    brest…
BNfr25458.Last Lines:
…Yet y conseille hym to be prestAnd fore aȝens the
                    warderereFor the &c.
